articles.description: The fans asked if Akaay automatically gets citizenship in the UK due to his alleged birthplace and the fact that Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma have a residence in London
articles.content: India's star cricketer Virat Kohli and actor Anushka Sharma announced the birth of their second child on 20 February. In a social media post, Virat Kohli revealed the arrival of their son Akaay, who … [+2105 chars]

articles.title: ICC U19 Men's Cricket World Cup is back after 14-day break - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The ICC U19 World Cup comes to Thailand as eight teams will be playing at AIT and TCG in Bangkok in the Division 2 Asia Qualifier.

articles.title: ITTF World Team Table Tennis Championships 2024: People's Republic of China captures record-extending 23rd women's title - Olympics
articles.description: Table tennis powerhouse China claimed their sixth consecutive title with a 3-2 win over a tenacious Japanese side in Busan, Republic of Korea on Saturday (24 February).
